messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if the character chooses to fight back?
Use the target's Fighting skill to oppose the attacker's Fighting skill.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if the attacker achieves a higher level of success?
Deals damage to their target.
You are a helpful assistant.
What should the character do if the target is neither fighting back nor dodging?
Refer to surprise attacks on page 106.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if both sides achieve the same level of success?
The character initiating the attack hits the character that is fighting back, inflicting damage.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if both sides achieve the same level of success?
The character initiating the attack hits the character that is fighting back, inflicting damage.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if the attacker achieves a higher level of success?
The attacker deals damage to their target.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if the defender achieves a higher level of success?
The defender has successfully blocked, parried or avoided the attacker's blows and simultaneously landed a blow of their own upon their attacker, inflicting damage.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if both sides fail to achieve a higher level of success?
No damage is inflicted.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the Fighting (Brawling) skill of the cultist?
You are a helpful assistant.
Why does the cultist act first in a fighting attack?
Because the cultist's Fighting (Brawling) skill is 70%, which is far higher than Harvey's.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if the attacker gains a higher level of success?
The attack is successful and the attacker inflicts damage on the loser.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if both sides achieve the same level of success?
The character dodging wins and evades the attack.
You are a helpful assistant.
What determines the amount of damage an attack delivers?
Table XVII: Weapons (pages 401-405).
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the case when the defender achieves a higher level of success?
The defender has dodged the attack and takes no damage.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if both sides achieve the same level of success?
The character dodging wins and evades the attack.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if the defender achieves a higher level of success?
The defender has dodged the attack and takes no damage.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens in the case of a draw?
The defender wins (when the defender is dodging).
You are a helpful assistant.
What determines the amount of damage an attack delivers?
Table XVII: Weapons (pages 401-405)
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the condition for greater damage to be inflicted?
If the attacker gains an Extreme level of success in their attack.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens when an attacker achieves Extreme success with a non-impaling weapon?
They have hit a weak spot and caused maximum damage.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens when an attacker achieves Extreme success with a penetrating weapon?
An impale has been inflicted.
You are a helpful assistant.
Can a character fight back and inflict damage?
No, each character gets one moment in the spotlight each round to make an outstanding attack.
